testcase.name: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than checkin date
testcase.system-out: Given user should be in adactin application.................................passed When user enter 'yazhinisrii' in the email field............................passed When user enter the 'yazhini' in the password field in loginpage............passed And user click on login button in the login page............................passed When user select location in search hotel page..............................passed When user select hotel in search hotel page.................................passed When user select room type in search hotel page.............................passed When user select number of rooms............................................passed When user enter checkin date later than check out date......................passed When user enter checkout date...............................................passed When user click the search button...........................................passed Then Verify that system gives an error saying check-in-date should not be later than check-out-date..passed
